description: Updates a Device Advisor test suite. Requires permission to access the UpdateSuiteDefinition action.

parameters.name: suiteDefinitionId
parameters.description: Suite definition ID of the test suite to be updated.

parameters.name: suiteDefinitionConfiguration
parameters.description: Updates a Device Advisor test suite with suite definition configuration. Gets the suite definition name. This is a required parameter. devices (list) --- Gets the devices configured. (dict) --- Information of a test device. A thing ARN, certificate ARN or device role ARN is required. thingArn (string) --- Lists device's thing ARN. certificateArn (string) --- Lists device's certificate ARN. deviceRoleArn (string) --- Lists device's role ARN. intendedForQualification (boolean) --- Gets the tests intended for qualification in a suite. isLongDurationTest (boolean) --- Verifies if the test suite is a long duration test. Gets the test suite root group. For updating or creating the latest qualification suite, if intendedForQualification is set to true, rootGroup can be an empty string. If intendedForQualification is false, rootGroup cannot be an empty string. If rootGroup is empty, and intendedForQualification is set to true, all the qualification tests are included, and the configuration is default. For a qualification suite, the minimum length is 0, and the maximum is 2048. For a non-qualification suite, the minimum length is 1, and the maximum is 2048. Gets the device permission ARN. protocol (string) --- Sets the MQTT protocol that is configured in the suite definition.

nested_params.name: suiteDefinitionName
nested_params.description: Gets the suite definition name. This is a required parameter.

nested_params.name: intendedForQualification
nested_params.description: Gets the tests intended for qualification in a suite.

nested_params.name: isLongDurationTest
nested_params.description: Verifies if the test suite is a long duration test.

nested_params.name: rootGroup
nested_params.description: Gets the test suite root group. This is a required parameter. For updating or creating the latest qualification suite, if intendedForQualification is set to true, rootGroup can be an empty string. If intendedForQualification is false, rootGroup cannot be an empty string. If rootGroup is empty, and intendedForQualification is set to true, all the qualification tests are included, and the configuration is default. For a qualification suite, the minimum length is 0, and the maximum is 2048. For a non-qualification suite, the minimum length is 1, and the maximum is 2048.

nested_params.name: devicePermissionRoleArn
nested_params.description: Gets the device permission ARN. This is a required parameter.

nested_params.name: protocol
nested_params.description: Sets the MQTT protocol that is configured in the suite definition.

nested_items.name: suiteDefinitionId
nested_items.description: Suite definition ID of the updated test suite.

nested_items.name: suiteDefinitionArn
nested_items.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the updated test suite.

nested_items.name: suiteDefinitionName
nested_items.description: Updates the suite definition name. This is a required parameter.

nested_items.name: suiteDefinitionVersion
nested_items.description: Suite definition version of the updated test suite.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: Timestamp of when the test suite was created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: Timestamp of when the test suite was updated.
